column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I've been to Lou Malnati's many times over the years
column2: and to this location several times.  Lou's pizza is the the "perfect" Chicago style pizza.  There are others the tourists tend to crowd to
column3: but Lou's is where the locals go for truly good Chicago pizza.  We always get the original salad and an original pizza
column4: sometimes having pepperoni added to the pizza.  It's just perfect
column5: and highly recommended when in Chicago.
